软件包 org.crosswire.bibledesktop.display.basic

This package provides the actual display of BookData.

类摘要
ActiveURITip How it works: 1.
LazyHTMLEditorKit  
SplitBookDataDisplay A SplitBookDataDisplay consists of a KeySidebar and a BookDataDisplay in a SplitPane.
TabbedBookDataDisplay An inner component of Passage pane that can't show the list.
TextPaneBookDataDisplay A JDK JTextPane implementation of an OSIS displayer.
URITipHelper Implement URIEventListener to receive URIEvents whenever someone activates an URI.
URITipMgr How it works: 1.
 

软件包 org.crosswire.bibledesktop.display.basic 的描述

This package provides the actual display of BookData. Passage data is split into bottom tabs on a user defined boundary. An user adjustable side panel is provided for Bibles.
